offenses.message: Gems should be sorted in an alphabetical order within their section of the Gemfile. Gem `pry` should appear before `watir`.
Gems should be sorted in an alphabetical order within their section of the Gemfile. Gem `pg` should appear before `standalone_migrations`.
Prefer single-quoted strings when you don't need string interpolation or special symbols.
Prefer single-quoted strings when you don't need string interpolation or special symbols.
Put empty method definitions on a single line.
Prefer single-quoted strings when you don't need string interpolation or special symbols.

Unused method argument - `args`. If it's necessary, use `_` or `_args` as an argument name to indicate that it won't be used. You can also write as `perform(*)` if you want the method to accept any arguments but don't care about them.
